title: Find Students Older Than Average
description: Write an SQL query to find students whose age is greater than the average age of all students (using a subquery).
expected_query: SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM students);
hints: Use a subquery to calculate AVG(age)
Compare age in the outer query with the subquery result
Average age is 21, so students older than 21 should appear
author: Jerico Jimenez
